rules_text:
Other Merfolk you control get +1/+1.
When Olantin Pearlreader enters the battlefield, scry 2. Then draw a card if you control another Merfolk.
notes:
#UB
AZORIUS
REDESIGN
Whenever you cast a spell that targets, put a +1/+1 counter on Memory Thief.
Whenever Memory Thief deals combat damage to a player, exile that many cards from the top of that player’s library. Until end of turn, you may cast a card exiled with Memory Thief and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any type to cast that spell.
